text_raw:

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. Regulation 4(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 4(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following: 

““Minister” means 
Communications.” 

the Minister 

for 

the Environment, Climate and 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 May, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN,

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the European Communities (Packaging) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 282 of 2014) to clarify the Minister with 
responsibility for the functions set out therein and to give further effect to 
Directive 94/62/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 
December 1994 on packaging and packaging waste, as amended. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [167]
